src:
Jadwal Pertandingan Shopee Liga 1 Hari Ini, Sabtu 2 November 2019
02 Nov 2019, 08:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 akan kembali menggelar pertandingan pekan ke-26. Dua pertandingan akan digelar hari ini, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
PSIS Semarang akan menjamu PSS Sleman di Stadion Maguwoharjo, Sleman. PSIS terpaksa menggelar laga kandang di markas lawan akibat gagal mengantongi izin apabila pertandingan dimainkan di kandang, Magelang.
Meski begitu, Laskar Mahesa Jenar bertekad kembali ke jalur kemenangan demi memperbaiki peringkat.
Namun, PSS tentu tak ingin menyelesaikan pertandingan tangan hampa. Pasukan asuhan pelatih Seto Nurdiyantoro itu bertekad meraih poin penuh untuk tetap bersaing di papan atas.
Sementara itu, Bhayangkara FC akan menjamu Semen Padang di Stadion PTIK, Jakarta. The Guardians sedang dalam kepercayaan diri tinggi karena pada laga sebelumnya meraih kemenangan.
Bhayangkara FC tentu bertekad melanjutkan tren positif. Adapun Semen Padang juga butuh poin penuh untuk bisa bangkit dari dasar klasemen sementara Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Satu pertandingan lagi sebenarnya terjadwal pada Sabtu hari ini, yakni Persebaya Surabaya menjamu PSM Makassar. Namun, hingga Jumat malam (1/11/2019), belum ada kejelasan venue pertandingan menyusul aksi kerusuhan yang dilakukan pendukung Bajul Ijo saat kalah dari PSS (29/10/2019).
Berikut jadwal Liga 1 2019 pada Sabtu (2/11/2019), selengkapnya.
text:
Shopee League 1 Match Schedule Today, Saturday 2 November 2019
02 Nov 2019, 08:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 will return to play the 26th match of the week. Two matches will be held today, Saturday (11/02/2019).
PSIS Semarang will host PSS Sleman at Maguwoharjo Stadium, Sleman. PSIS was forced to hold a home match at the opponent's headquarters due to failing to have permission if the match was played at home, Magelang.
Even so, Laskar Mahesa Jenar was determined to return to winning ways in order to improve the ranking.
However, PSS certainly does not want to complete a hollow hand match. Coach Seto Nurdiyantoro's care team was determined to win full points to keep competing in the top flight.
Meanwhile, Bhayangkara FC will host Semen Padang at the PTIK Stadium, Jakarta. The Guardians are in high confidence because in the previous fight won.
Bhayangkara FC is certainly determined to continue the positive trend. The Semen Padang also need full points to get up from the bottom of the 2019 Shopee Liga 1 standings.
One more match is actually scheduled for Saturday today, namely Surabaya Surabaya host PSM Makassar. However, until Friday night (1/11/2019), there was no clarity on the match venue following the riots by Bajul Ijo supporters when they lost to PSS (10/29/2019).
Following is the 2019 League 1 schedule on Saturday (11/02/2019), in full.
